casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Savalis SUMMERS 328A11-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 16, 2019 Shelagh R. Kenney, Attorney at Law, M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Summers, Tony Savalis. Steven Cole, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Jonathan E. Broun, Attorney at Law, Durham.

M. Gordan Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2018 to Withdraw as Counsel and Allow the Office of the Appellate Defender to Appoint Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of January 2019."
